TITLE: Preventing Direct Access to Bitrix Templates in PHP DESCRIPTION: Code snippet to prevent direct access to site and component templates in the browser. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Menu from Information Blocks in Bitrix DESCRIPTION: Example of using the menu.sections component to create a menu from information blocks in Bitrix. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` IncludeComponent( "bitrix:menu.sections", // секция меню "", Array( "ID" => $_REQUEST["ID"], "IBLOCK_TYPE" => "books", "IBLOCK_ID" => "5", "SECTION_URL" => "/catalog/phone/section.php?", //дополнительное меню "DEPTH_LEVEL" => "1", "CACHE_TYPE" => "A", "CACHE_TIME" => "3600" ) ); $aMenuLinks = array_merge($aMenuLinks, $aMenuLinksExt); ?> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting and Showing View Content in Bitrix Templates DESCRIPTION: Example of setting and showing view content in Bitrix templates for custom layout sections. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` SetViewTarget("sidebar");?>
EndViewTarget();?>
``` LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ```
ShowViewContent("sidebar")?>
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Including PHP File in Bitrix Template DESCRIPTION: Example of including a PHP file as a component in a Bitrix template. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` IncludeFile( SITE_DIR . "include/news.php", array(), array("MODE" => "html") ); ?> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Including Bitrix Component in PHP Template DESCRIPTION: Example of including a Bitrix breadcrumb component in a template file. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ```
IncludeComponent('bitrix:breadcrumb','', array( "PATH"=> "", "SITE_ID" => "ip", "START_FROM" => "0" )) ?>
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Page Title in Bitrix Template DESCRIPTION: Code snippet to display the page title in a Bitrix template. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` <? $APPLICATION->ShowTitle(); ?> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Locating Bitrix Page Templates in PHP DESCRIPTION: File paths for storing page templates in Bitrix Framework. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` /bitrix/templates/.default/page_templates/; /bitrix/templates/ID шаблона сайта/page_templates/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Bitrix System Components in PHP DESCRIPTION: File path to system components in Bitrix Framework. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` /bitrix/components/bitrix/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Locating Bitrix Core Modules Directory in PHP DESCRIPTION: File path to the core CMS modules in Bitrix Framework. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` /bitrix/modules/ ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Accessing Bitrix Admin Panel in PHP DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing the URL path to access the Bitrix CMS admin panel. SOURCE: https://github.com/sodegov/bitrixdocs/blob/main/bitriksDocs.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: PHP CODE: ``` site.com/bitriks/admin ```
